mapper.select:
SELECT id, resource_id, parent_id, model_id, name_en, name_cn, range_id, model_type, status, create_time, update_time, is_standard, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC001, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC002, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC003, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC004, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC005, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC006, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC007, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC008, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC009, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC010, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC011, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC012, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC013, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC014, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC015, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC016, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC017, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC018, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC019, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC020, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC021, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC022, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC023, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC024, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC025, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC026, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC027, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC028, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC029, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC030, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC031, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC032, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC033, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC034, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC035, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC036, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC037, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC038, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC039, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC040, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC041, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC042, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC043, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC044, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC045, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC046, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC047, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC048, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC049, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC050, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC051, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC052, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC053, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC054, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC055, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC056, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC057, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC058, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC059, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC060, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC061, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC062, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC063, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC064, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC065, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC066, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC067, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC068, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC069, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC070, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC071, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC072, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC073, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC074, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC075, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC076, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC077, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC078, EX_VARCHAR_L50_VC079,
EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC001, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC002, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC003, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC004, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC005, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC006, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC007, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC008, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC009, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC010, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC011, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC012, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC013, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC014, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC015, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC016, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC017, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC018, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC019, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC020, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC021, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC022, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC023, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC024, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC025, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC026, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC027, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC028, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC029, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC030, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC031, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC032, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC033, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC034, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC035, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC036, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC037, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC038, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC039, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC040, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC041, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC042, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC043, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC044, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC045, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC046, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC047, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC048, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC049, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC050, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC051, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC052, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC053, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC054, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC055, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC056, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC057, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC058, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC059, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC060, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC061, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC062, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC063, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC064, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC065, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC066, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC067, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC068, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC069, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC070, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC071, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC072, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC073, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC074, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC075, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC076, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC077, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC078, EX_VARCHAR_L100_VC079,
EX_DATETIME_DT001, EX_DATETIME_DT002, EX_DATETIME_DT003, EX_DATETIME_DT004, EX_DATETIME_DT005, EX_DATETIME_DT006, EX_DATETIME_DT007, EX_DATETIME_DT008, EX_DATETIME_DT009, EX_DATETIME_DT010, EX_DATETIME_DT011, EX_DATETIME_DT012, EX_DATETIME_DT013, EX_DATETIME_DT014, EX_DATETIME_DT015, EX_DATETIME_DT016, EX_DATETIME_DT017, EX_DATETIME_DT018, EX_DATETIME_DT019, EX_DATETIME_DT020, EX_TEXT_T001, EX_TEXT_T002, EX_TEXT_T003, EX_TEXT_T004, EX_TEXT_T005, EX_TEXT_T006, EX_TEXT_T007, EX_TEXT_T008, EX_TEXT_T009, EX_TEXT_T010, EX_TEXT_T011, EX_TEXT_T012, EX_TEXT_T013, EX_TEXT_T014, EX_TEXT_T015, EX_TEXT_T016, EX_TEXT_T017, EX_TEXT_T018, EX_TEXT_T019, EX_TEXT_T020, EX_TEXT_T021, EX_TEXT_T022, EX_TEXT_T023, EX_TEXT_T024, EX_TEXT_T025, EX_TEXT_T026, EX_TEXT_T027, EX_TEXT_T028, EX_TEXT_T029 FROM mdm_metadata_value where FIND_IN_SET(resource_id,#{ids})

select tt.*,p.range_values,p.custom_conditions,p.cancel_data_masking,p.permission_update,p.permission_delete,p.permission_create from mdm_model_resource_v tt join mdm_role_resource_permission p on tt.resource_id = p.resource_id and tt.parent_resource_id = p.parent_resource_id where p.role_id = #{roleId} order by tt.parent_uuid desc

select * from mdm_model_resource_v where 1=1
AND uuid = #{uuid}
select * from mdm_model_resource_v where name_cn like concat(concat('%',#{queryString}),'%') OR name_en like concat(concat('%',#{queryString}),'%')

select id, resource_id, parent_id, model_id, name_en, name_cn, range_id, model_type, status, create_time, update_time from mdm_metadata_value where resource_id = (select parent_id from mdm_metadata_value where resource_id = (select parent_id from mdm_metadata_value where resource_id = #{metadataValue.resourceId} ) )

select v.resource_id id,IFNULL(v.name_cn,v.name_en) name, v.model_type modelType,v.model_id modelId,v.parent_id parentId, r.source_id sourceId,r.target_id targetId from mdm_resource_reference r left join mdm_metadata_value v on v.resource_id = r.source_id where r.ref_type = 'ITEM_ITEM'
